title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for April 2025
description: The bonus round solutions for April. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for April 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today throughout April 2025. We'll post the Fan Friday word as well.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll see the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of April 2025. As always, we’ll provide the answer to the final puzzle first and then list the solutions to the toss-ups and standard puzzles. We’ll continue to the update this post throughout the month on the daily. The theme for this week is Disney Magical Fairy Tale, so the puzzles should be related to Disney properties somehow. These solutions are for the syndicated show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, with tonight’s game featuring three new contestants: Tiara Reed, Gregory Harrington, and Mike Gaithkey. (We’ll have a separate post for Celebrity Wheel of Fortune with Pat Sajak when it pops back on April 30.) Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for April 23. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, April 23, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. #4 – BASHFUL, DOPEY AND DOC [Characters] Tossup #5 – SLEEPY AND SNEEZY [Characters] Regular Puzzle #4 – NOT A MOMENT TOO SOON [Phrase] Here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, April 22: Bonus Round We’ll provide the Fan Friday word for the sweepstakes once it’s shown during April 4, 11, 18, and 25. The iHeartRadio Giveaway will be active between April 7 and April 10. If you enter the Bonus Round puzzle solution at the Wheel Watchers Club during those nights, you will have a chance to win VIP tickets to music events around the country. A similar contest called the Hawaiian Vacation Giveaway sponsored by Hilton will be available from April 14 to April 18.

As always, we’ll provide the answer to the final puzzle first and then list the solutions to the toss-ups and standard puzzles. We’ll continue to the update this post throughout the month on the daily.

The theme for this week is Disney Magical Fairy Tale, so the puzzles should be related to Disney properties somehow. These solutions are for the syndicated show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, with tonight’s game featuring three new contestants: Tiara Reed, Gregory Harrington, and Mike Gaithkey. (We’ll have a separate post for Celebrity Wheel of Fortune with Pat Sajak when it pops back on April 30.) Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for April 23.
